resources.string: We are a charitable trust dedicated to social welfare initiatives in Tamil Nadu. Our mission is to uplift underprivileged communities by providing education, healthcare, and support services. Key Initiatives: • Community development programs • Educational support for children • Animal welfare and rescue operations

Registered under Section 12A and approved under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Registration Nos: 12A: AAETV2179BE20241 | 80G: AAETV2179BF20241 Established on: 21st December 2023 Our Team A dedicated group of volunteers and professionals work towards achieving our vision. Values and Vision • Integrity and transparency • Commitment to social change • Community-driven development
